informacoes.informationPageDescription: Explore essential resources for Angolan farmers, including pests, crops, and cultivation guides.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most frequently asked questions about the Agricultural Calendar for Angola
faq.teamReady: Our team is ready to help with any additional questions.

questions.question: What is the Agricultural Calendar for Angola?
questions.answer: It is a digital platform that helps Angolan farmers plan their agricultural activities based on local climate conditions and practices in each region of Angola.

questions.question: Is the service free?
questions.answer: Yes, the Agricultural Calendar for Angola is completely free for all farmers. We want to support the development of agriculture in Angola.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account?
questions.answer: It is not mandatory to create an account to use the basic features, but we recommend creating one to save your preferences and data.

questions.question: What languages are available?
questions.answer: The platform is available in Portuguese, English, Kimbundo, and Umbundo, covering the main languages spoken in Angola.
